hero-desc: Experience unique and immersive Minecraft worlds with LuminaKraft Studios
ancientkraft_rechapter-desc: The ultimate RPG adventure experience - completely rebuilt with revolutionary magic, next-gen combat, and expanded worlds. Now without LAG!
onepieceworlds2-desc: Master advanced Haki, discover rare Devil Fruits, and conquer the New World in this enhanced One Piece experience.
luminakraft_world-desc: Custom world, unique dungeons, scaling mobs, skills, economy, land claiming, PvP control, live map.
onepieceworld-desc: Live the great adventure of One Piece: find Devil Fruits and master the seas.
ancientkraft-desc: RPG-style Adventure modpack with custom magic system, custom combat, and more
pt-the_full_course-desc: Flagship survival server with custom plugins and events
pt-full-course-desc: Flagship survival server with custom plugins and events
coming-soon-desc: Coming soon! Stay tuned for more information
server-feature-ancientkraft_rechapter-1-: Experience a completely redesigned magic system with advanced spellcrafting, elemental mastery, and magical progression paths
server-feature-ancientkraft_rechapter-2-: Engage in dynamic battles with overhauled combat systems, weapon skills, and tactical abilities that redefine PvP and PvE
server-feature-ancientkraft_rechapter-3-: Explore vast reimagined worlds with new biomes, enhanced dungeons, legendary artifacts, and secrets waiting to be discovered
server-feature-ancientkraft_rechapter-4-: Join improved guilds with advanced progression, territory control, guild wars, and collaborative content based on ancient realms
server-feature-onepieceworlds2-1-desc: Discover rare and powerful Devil Fruits with unique combinations and evolution mechanics.
server-feature-onepieceworlds2-2-desc: Master all three types of Haki with a deep progression system and special techniques.
server-feature-onepieceworlds2-3-desc: Venture into the dangerous New World, where stronger enemies and greater treasures await.
server-feature-onepieceworlds2-4-desc: Create your own pirate crew, establish territories, and engage in epic naval battles.
server-feature-luminakraft_world-1-desc: Enjoy a lag-free and stable survival experience thanks to the power of Paper server software.
server-feature-luminakraft_world-2-desc: Play on your preferred version, as LuminaKraft World supports clients from 1.9.x all the way up to 1.21.x.
server-feature-luminakraft_world-3-desc: Discover a variety of custom plugins that add exciting features and improve the overall survival experience.
server-feature-luminakraft_world-4-desc: Become part of a friendly and active community of players who share your passion for survival and adventure.
server-feature-onepieceworld-1-desc: Consume powerful fruits that will grant you special abilities, but beware of the sea!
server-feature-onepieceworld-2-desc: Master Haki, martial arts and combat styles inspired by characters like Sanji or Zoro.
server-feature-onepieceworld-3-desc: Navigate through legendary islands, discover treasures and face dangerous pirates and marines.
server-feature-onepieceworld-4-desc: Join a crew, face other players, or form alliances to dominate the seas.
server-feature-ancientkraft-1-desc: Master unique spells and harness the power of the elements
server-feature-ancientkraft-2-desc: Experience thrilling battles with improved mechanics and abilities
server-feature-ancientkraft-3-desc: Discover ancient ruins, hidden treasures, and challenging dungeons
server-feature-ancientkraft-4-desc: Team up with friends or join a faction to conquer the world together
server-feature-pt-the_full_course-1-desc: Discover a world full of secrets and surprises to uncover
server-feature-pt-the_full_course-2-desc: Join a friendly and collaborative community of players
server-feature-pt-the_full_course-3-desc: Enjoy exclusive plugins that enhance your gaming experience
server-feature-pt-the_full_course-4-desc: Participate in special events and competitions organized by the staff
step1-desc-modpack: Get the installer from our official site
step2-desc-modpack: Follow the instructions in the installer
step3-desc-modpack: Open the game and press the "Set Sail to
step3-desc-vanilla: Add and connect to our server using the IP
auto-connect-desc: The modpack will automatically connect to server just by clicking a button!
services-intro: LuminaKraft Studios offers professional Minecraft server solutions for businesses and content creators:
collaborators-intro: Meet the talented collaborators who make our amazing servers possible:
about-1: Founded in 2024, LuminaKraft Studios has been at the forefront of innovation in Minecraft servers. Our team of passionate Minecraft enthusiasts and expert developers works tirelessly to create unique and engaging multiplayer experiences.
about-2: With a focus on community-driven content and cutting-edge server technology, we strive to push the boundaries of what's possible in the world of Minecraft.
ceo-description: With over 7 years of experience as a Minecraft server owner, Kristian is responsible for all technical and logical aspects of LuminaKraft Studios. As a FullStack developer experienced in Java, Python, C#, JavaScript, Kotlin, and PHP, he handles server hosting, web maintenance, Discord management, and all internal systems that make our gaming experiences possible.
ceo-skills: FullStack Developer | +7 years of MC experience
cofounder-description: Junior is the creative mind behind LuminaKraft Studios. With an exceptional imagination, he is responsible for conceiving the innovative ideas for our servers, drawing inspiration from the best games on the market. He coordinates our team of workers who help in building and testing servers in development.
workers-description: We have a dedicated team of collaborators who help us build and test our servers in development, ensuring that every detail is perfect before launch.
contact-intro: Interested in our services or have questions about our servers? Get in touch with us and we'll be happy to help you with anything you need!
donate-intro: Help us continue developing innovative servers and unique experiences in Minecraft. Your support is essential for us to continue creating quality content and improving our community.
leaderboard-description: Check out our top players this month!
privacy-policy-desc: Information about how LuminaKraft Studios collects, uses, and protects your personal data.
privacy-intro-1: LuminaKraft Studios ("we", "our", or "us") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you visit our website (luminakraft.com), play on our Minecraft servers, or use our related services.
privacy-intro-2: Please read this privacy policy carefully to understand our practices regarding your personal data.
privacy-collect-intro: We may collect the following types of information:
privacy-collect-account-desc: Minecraft username, UUID, and email address (if provided).
privacy-collect-usage-desc: Information about your interactions with our servers, including game statistics, in-game actions, and chat messages.
privacy-collect-technical-desc: IP address, browser type and version, time zone setting, operating system, and device information.
privacy-collect-communication-desc: Information you provide when contacting us through our website, social media, or Discord server.
privacy-use-intro: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:
privacy-use-1: To provide, maintain, and improve our services.
privacy-use-2: To moderate and enforce our server rules.
privacy-use-3: To personalize your experience and provide content tailored to your interests.
privacy-use-4: To communicate with you regarding updates, technical issues, or your inquiries.
privacy-use-5: To ensure the security of our network and services.
privacy-sharing-intro: We do not sell your personal information to third parties. We may share your information in the following circumstances:
privacy-sharing-1: With service providers who help us operate our services (such as hosting providers).
privacy-sharing-2: To comply with legal obligations or enforce our terms of service.
privacy-sharing-3: With your consent or at your direction.
privacy-sharing-4: When necessary to protect our rights, property, or safety, or that of our users or others.
privacy-security-desc: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacy-rights-intro: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, which may include:
privacy-rights-1: The right to access and receive a copy of your personal data.
privacy-rights-2: The right to rectify or update your personal data.
privacy-rights-3: The right to request deletion of your personal data.
privacy-rights-4: The right to restrict or object to the processing of your personal data.
privacy-rights-outro: To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided at the end of this policy.
privacy-children-desc: Our services are not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us, and we will take steps to delete such information.
privacy-cookies-desc: Our website may use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience. You can set your browser to refuse all or some browser cookies, but this may affect your ability to use certain features of our website.
privacy-changes-desc: We may update our privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new privacy policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date. You are advised to review this privacy policy periodically for any changes.
privacy-contact-intro: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact us at:
terms-of-service-desc: Terms and conditions for using LuminaKraft Studios services and Minecraft servers.
terms-intro-1: Welcome to LuminaKraft Studios. These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of our website, Minecraft servers, and related services (collectively, the "Services"). By accessing or using our Services, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
terms-intro-2: Please read these Terms carefully. If you do not agree to these Terms, you may not access or use our Services.
terms-account-intro: When using our Services, you are responsible for:
terms-account-1: Maintaining the security and confidentiality of your Minecraft account and any other accounts used to access our Services.
terms-account-2: All activities that occur under your account.
terms-account-3: Ensuring that your use of our Services complies with these Terms, our server rules, and all applicable laws and regulations.
terms-conduct-intro: While using our Services, you agree not to:
terms-conduct-1: Use cheats, hacks, or unauthorized modifications that provide an unfair advantage.
terms-conduct-2: Engage in harassment, bullying, hate speech, or any form of abusive behavior towards others.
terms-conduct-3: Attempt to disrupt or interfere with our Services, including our servers, network, or any related equipment.
terms-conduct-4: Impersonate LuminaKraft Studios staff, moderators, or other players.
terms-conduct-5: Share or distribute content that infringes on intellectual property rights, contains malware, or is otherwise illegal or harmful.
terms-content-1: LuminaKraft Studios owns all rights, title, and interest in and to our Services, including all content, features, and functionality. Minecraft is a trademark of Mojang AB, and we are not affiliated with, endorsed by, or connected to Mojang AB.
terms-content-2: By creating content within our servers (such as builds, items, or other in-game creations), you grant us a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, modify, and display such content in connection with our Services.
terms-termination-desc: We reserve the right to temporarily or permanently suspend or terminate your access to our Services at any time, with or without notice, for any reason, including but not limited to violations of these Terms or our server rules. Upon termination, your right to use our Services will immediately cease.
terms-disclaimers-1: OUR SERVICES ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED. TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, WE DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT.
terms-disclaimers-2: We do not guarantee that our Services will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free, or that any defects will be corrected.
terms-liability-desc: TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, IN NO EVENT WILL LUMINAKRAFT STUDIOS, ITS AFFILIATES, OR THEIR RESPECTIVE OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, OR AGENTS BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO YOUR ACCESS TO OR USE OF, OR INABILITY TO ACCESS OR USE, OUR SERVICES.
terms-law-desc: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Spain, without regard to its conflict of law principles. Any disputes arising under or in connection with these Terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located in Spain.
terms-changes-desc: We may update these Terms from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Terms on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date. Your continued use of our Services after such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms.
terms-donations-1: We may offer virtual items or perks in exchange for donations or purchases. These are provided as-is and are non-refundable except where required by applicable law.
terms-donations-2: We reserve the right to modify or remove any virtual items or perks at any time, with or without notice. Donations are voluntary and do not create any ownership rights in our Services or entitle you to any specific features or content.
terms-contact-intro: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:
services-subtitle: Custom Minecraft server solutions designed for businesses, content creators, and communities
service-1-desc: We design customized servers that adapt to your specific goals and the experience you want to offer to your community. From themed servers to complete networks with multiple game modes, we create unique solutions.
service-1-item-1: Complete server configuration tailored to your specifications
service-1-item-2: Installation and configuration of essential plugins
service-1-item-3: Optimization to ensure performance and stability
service-2-desc: We take care of all the technical aspects so you can focus on managing your community. We keep your server updated, secure, and optimized at all times.
service-3-desc: We create balanced and optimized modpacks with innovative mechanics that offer unique experiences for your players. Each modpack is developed with performance and fun in mind.
service-3-item-2: Custom configuration for a balanced experience
service-4-desc: We develop an installer with an intuitive graphical interface that automatically downloads the modpack, creates the server profile, and allows you to play with just one button click.
service-4-item-1: Custom graphical interface with the server's theme
service-4-item-3: Creation of Forge/Fabric profile with optimized memory
service-4-item-4: One-click connection to the server without manual configuration
service-5-desc: We provide hosting solutions specifically optimized for Minecraft servers, with high-performance hardware, DDoS protection, and specialized technical support.
service-5-item-1: Servers with high-frequency CPUs for better TPS
service-6-desc: We work closely with you to understand your needs and offer solutions tailored to your specific project.
faq-development-time: How long does custom server development take?
faq-development-time-answer: Development time varies depending on project complexity. A basic server can be ready in 1-2 weeks, while more complex projects may take 1-3 months. We work with you to establish a realistic timeline.
faq-server-types: What types of servers can you develop?
faq-server-types-answer: We develop all types of servers: survival, factions, minigames, roleplay, SkyBlock, economy, PvP, and custom themed servers. If you can imagine it, we can build it.
faq-maintenance: Do you offer maintenance after launch?
faq-maintenance-answer: Yes, we offer ongoing maintenance plans to ensure your server continues to run optimally. These include updates, backups, monitoring, and technical support.
faq-development-process: How does the development process work?
faq-development-process-answer: Our process includes: 1) Initial consultation to understand your needs, 2) Proposal and budget, 3) Development and testing, 4) Launch and training, 5) Ongoing support. We keep you informed throughout the process.
faq-payment-methods: What payment methods do you accept?
faq-payment-methods-answer: We accept PayPal, bank transfers, and cryptocurrencies. We typically work with a 50% upfront and 50% on delivery model for large projects.
cta-ready: Ready to take your server to the next level?
cta-contact: Contact us today to discuss your project and how we can help you create an exceptional Minecraft experience.
auth-signin-subtitle: Sign in to continue to LuminaKraft
auth-terms: By signing up, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
auth-success-subtitle: Your account has been linked with LuminaKraft.
auth-ready-launcher: You can now return to the launcher.
auth-launcher-connect-error: Could not connect to the launcher.
auth-password-length: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth-check-email: Please check your email to confirm your account.
download-section-desc: The best way to play our modpacks. Automatic updates, Java management, and optimized performance.
